channel.title: CVs on Alessandra [Ali] Valcarcel
channel.description: Recent content in CVs on Alessandra [Ali] Valcarcel

item.description: Alessandra [Ali] Valcarcel Born in Miami, FL Lives in Philadelphia, PA Education: Ph.D. Biostatistics (anticipated 2020) University of Pennsylvania M.S. Biostatistics (2017) University of Pennsylvania B.A. Biology and Statistics (Honors) (2015) University of Connecticut Select Publications: 2018 - Journal of Neuroimaging. “MIMoSA: An Automated Method for Intermodal Segmentation Analysis of Multiple Sclerosis Brain Lesions.” 2017 - Frontiers in Genetics. “Illustrating, Quantifying and Correcting for Bias in Post-hoc Analysis of Gene-Based Rare Variant Tests of Association.
